input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration entry defined in a configuration module.
Example: BCAN
String Value - A description of the change
String Value - A detailed description of the change

String Value - Scheduled start date (epoch)
Example: 1262307600

String Value - Scheduled end date (epoch)
Example: 1262307600

String Value - Actual start date (epoch)
Example: 1262307600

Approval type for the change request to be created.
Allowed values: pre_approved, approval_required

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The change concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: 0-success,1-failure
String Value â€“ A verbose message indicating the success or failure of the process

output.value: Unable to retrieve details for requested for user name.
Requested for user name has been supplied

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="string(number('${epoch date}')+5)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="number(.)>=number('${scheduled start date}')"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${scheduled start date}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="number('${epoch-date}')>=number('${scheduled start date}')"> <xsl:value-of select="string(number('${epoch-date}')+5)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${scheduled start date}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="string(number('${epoch date}')+5)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${requested by first name}') = '0'">${default first name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${requested by first name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${requested by last name}') = '0'">${default last name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${requested by last name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow creates a change record.
